name: Inject
description:
Inject is a fast paced action-defense game with a syringe as your weapon! Are your hands steady enough to stop the infection?

Help Dr. Pokewell on his mission by injecting swarms of germs that are trying to invade your patient's body. But remember to inject slowly or else you’ll be in over your head!


Features:
-Beautiful hand-drawn retina graphics
-First-ever injection game mechanic
-Special items to unlock
-Powerful abilities to upgrade
-Lots of different fluids to inject
-Soundtrack from Five Stripe Studios
-Stat-boosting achievements
-An epic final boss battle
-An awesome Pill-Ship!


Please note: iPhone 3GS, iPod 3/4 and iPad 1 are NOT supported due to lack of memory.
